property.value: Choten's Advisor - Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

property.value: Strobe Pulse - When this creature enters the battle zone, tap target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hungry! - This creature attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stinky - When this creature enters the battle zone, your opponent chooses and discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Quillspike Harvest - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mighty Roar - Whenever this creature attacks, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Skirmisher Recalibrate - If this creature would be banished, put it into your shield zone face down as a new shield instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Rapid Fire - When this creature enters the battle zone, banish up to 2 target enemy creatures that each have power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Guard Evo Archive - At the end of each of your turns, if you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Shadow Champions. Double Breaker Impale - Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses and discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Enforcers. Blocker Double Breaker Raise the Alarm - Whenever another creature is banished during your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Beast Kin. Double Breaker One with Nature - If this creature would be banished, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wings of Flame - When this creature enters the battle zone, choose one of your other creatures. It gets "Powerful Attack +2000" until end of turn. A creature that has "Powerful Attack +2000" gets +2000 power while attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Holiday Bash - When this creature enters the battle zone, each player may draw 3 cards. Then your opponent may put any number of non-evolution creatures into the battle zone from his or her hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Uplink - If this creature would be banished, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Flawless Champion - While you have 5 or more shields, this creature gets +6000 power and has "Triple Breaker."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fast Attack Double Breaker Hypersonic Charge - This creature can attack untapped creatures on the turn it enters the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: War Cry - When this creature wins a battle, you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thought Blind - This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Powerful Attack +4000 Double Breaker Electro-Field - Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may put the top card of your deck into your shield face-down as a new shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Sword of Outrage - This creature can attack tapped creatures on the turn it enters the battle zone. Sword of Reaping - Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Spell-Scrounge - When this creature enters the battle zone, each player puts the top card of his or her deck into his or her discard pile. For each spell put into a discard pile this way, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Double Breaker Distress Beacon - When this creature is banished, draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters you mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Piercing Gaze - When this creature enters the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random. If that card is level 3 or less, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters you mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Frozen Field - This creature can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than it. Ice Wave - Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters you mana zone tapped.) Resurge - When this creature enters the battle zone, choose a creature in your discard pile and return it to your hand. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that is level 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Powerful Attack +2000 Fists of Fury - This creature can attack tapped creatures on the turn it enters the battle zone. Eject - If this creature would be banished, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Dreadful Chant - Each of your Corrupted creatures can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Protector Double Breaker Spirit Swap - Whenever this creature wins a battle, choose a creature in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Lava Wave - While you have only Corrupted creatures in the battle zone, this creature has "Powerful Attack +4000" and "Double Breaker."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped) Evolution - Put on one of your Enforcers or Beast Kin. Pack Sworn - All your Beast Kin have "Protector." Inspirit - At the end of each of your turns, untap all your Enforcers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Lava Thorns - When this creature enters the battle zone, banish all enemy creatures that have power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Skirmisher Spell Echo — When this creature enters the battle zone, you may choose a spell in your discard pile that is level 3 or less and cast it for free. If you do, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of into your discard pile after you cast it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Guard Snowball Fight - Whenever one of your creatures attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, target enemy creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn. I'm Melting! - When an Armored Dragon or Melt Warrior attacks, banish this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Skirmisher Juiced - If this creature would be banished, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until the start of your next turn, each of your creatures wins all of its battles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Guard Spirit Guide — Whenever this creature blocks, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a creature from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eye of Logos — Whenever you cast a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters you mana zone tapped.) Munch — Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a creature in your discard pile and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you do, this creature gets power equal to that creature's power until the end of the turn. Necrocharged — While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "Double Breaker." While it has power 12000 or more, it has "Triple Breaker."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Fire creatures. Double Breaker Magma Burst - When this creature is banished, banish target enemy creature that has power less than or equal to this creature's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Light creatures. Blocker Double Breaker Unleash - Untap all your creatures at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Water creatures. Double Breaker Unleash - Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Darkness creatures. Double Breaker Unleash - Your opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Fire creatures. Double Breaker Unleash - All your creatures get "Fast Attack" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Nature creatures. Double Breaker Unleash - Search your deck. You may reveal a creature from it and put that creature into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Water creatures. Blocker, Double Breaker Unleash - This creature gets +5000 power until the end of the turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution — Put on one of your Nature creatures. Double Breaker Thornshot — While this creature has power 12000 or more, it has "Triple Breaker." Quillspike Defender — All your other creatures can't be attacked. Unleash — For each other creature you have in the battle zone, this creature gets +3000 power until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution — Put on one of your Fire creatures. Adaptive Weaponry — This creature can attack untapped creatures on the turn it enters the battle zone. Counterstrike — Whenever this creature becomes the target of an opponent's spell or ability, this creature breaks one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Banish target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Light creatures. Double Breaker Beacon of Hope - Whenever you're attacked for the first time each turn, you may untap one of your other creatures. It gets "Blocker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Impede — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, put the top card of your deck into your shield zone face down as a new shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Vaporize — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, return target creature from the battle zone to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Animate — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, put a non-evolution creature from your discard pile into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Brawl — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, this creature battles target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pummel — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, each of your creatures gets +5000 power until the end of the turn and breaks an additional shield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution - Put on 2 of your Fire creatures. Double Breaker Outmaneuver - At the end of each of your turns, you may return any number of your tapped creatures from the battle zone to your hand. Talon Fury - Whenever this creature attacks, banish all enemy creatures that have power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution - Put on 2 of your Water creatures. Psychic Echo - When this creature enters the battle zone, return all cards from under it to your hand. Thought Blind - This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Avast, Ye Mateys! — When this creature enters the battle zone, each player may choose a non-evolution creature in his or her discard pile that is level 3 or less and put it into the battle zone. Parting Plunder — Whenever this creature or another creature is banished, its owner may draw a card.
